description: This file sets up an AI agent with specific tools and instructions to research a topic and generate an article, including importing modules, creating an agent instance, and executing a response.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent configured with a model, tools, and instructions to perform research and content generation.

classes.name: Groq
classes.description: A model class representing a specific language model configuration.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A tool class for performing searches using DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: Newspaper4kTools
classes.description: A tool class for extracting article content using Newspaper4k.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and output a response based on a topic, streaming the output.
